instructions: Create or sign in to your Analytics account: Go to google.com/analytics Do one of the following: To create an account, click Start for free . To sign in to your account, Click Sign in to Analytics . Add a property to your Analytics account . A property represents your app or website, and is the collection point in Analytics for the data from your app/website. Add a data stream your property . A data stream supplies data from a specific combination of platform and app (e.g., My Android App, My iOS App) or from a specific website. Add the measurement code to your app or website so you can collect data in your Analytics property.
